keyword: calories in chicken biscuit from mcdonalds
title: Calories in McDonald's Chicken Biscuit
meta_description: Learn calories in chicken biscuit from McDonalds: 510 kcal per serving, plus carbs, protein, fat, sodium, and full nutrition details for this breakfast item.
assumptions: McDonald's standard Chicken Biscuit: crispy fried chicken patty on a warm baked biscuit with margarine spread; no additional toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, preparation, and portion size. Based on McDonald's official data; check app or website for latest values.

quick_answer.text: A McDonald's Chicken Biscuit provides 510 kcal, 16 g protein, and 50 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories in chicken biscuit from McDonalds?
faqs.a: 510 kcal for one standard Chicken Biscuit.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a McDonald's chicken biscuit?
faqs.a: About 16 g of protein per serving.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in McDonald's chicken biscuit?
faqs.a: 1080 mg of sodium, so watch intake if limiting salt.

faqs.q: Are there carbs in chicken biscuit from McDonalds?
faqs.a: Yes, 50 g total carbs, mostly from the biscuit.

faqs.q: How does McDonald's chicken biscuit compare to sausage biscuit?
faqs.a: Similar calories (around 430 for sausage), but chicken has more protein and slightly higher fat.
